    • com.gmail.woodyc40.commons.concurrent.collect.UnsafeLock

      • readAndRemove

        private UnsafeLock.ThreadNode readAndRemove()
        Reads the head of the linked list, remove it, and return the original head. Based off of the algorithm found here
        Returns:
        the original head of the linked list, before replacement with the next
